result.longName: Kuwait and Middle East Financial Investment Company K.S.C.P.

assetProfile.address2: Floor 5, Block 1 Al-Qibla Arabian Gulf Street
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Kuwait and Middle East Financial Investment Company K.S.C.P. operates as an asset management and financial services company in the Middle East. The company operates through Asset management; Brokerage and Online Trading; Credit operations; Investment, Real Estate and Treasury; and Rental and Leasing Activities segments. It provides third party fund and portfolio management services on a fiduciary basis; online and brokerage services; and margin loans to the clients trading in Boursa Kuwait and commercial loans to the clients. The company is also involved in the money market placements business; real estate activities; proprietary trading in equity stocks and funds across gulf cooperation countries and international markets; investment products; advisory services; and vehicle rental and leasing activities. It serves private and institutional clients. The company was incorporated in 1984 and is headquartered in Kuwait City, Kuwait. Kuwait and Middle East Financial Investment Company K.S.C.P. operates as a subsidiary of Al Thekair General Trading & Contracting Co.
